item.description:
This is an opportunity for you to try Sangria (a Spanish wine punch made with fresh fruit and blends of wine) along with your favorite chips n's dips. Lauren has offered up her parents' house for a private party. This event is limited to only a few "members only."
I hope everybody likes "Gipsy Kings" and Spanish Guitar Music. If you PLAY an acoustic guitar (do not have to play Spanish style, any style will do)...please bring!

Please give $5 pp to Lauren to cover the cost of making the Sangria

Bring your favorite dip, salad or Spanish dessert (Flan, three leches cake, etc.)

Lauren will supply rice, beans and chips


Street parking is available for Cambridge residents stickers..all others take the Red Line to Central Square.
item.how_to_find_us: Location and phone number will be emailed to "yes" rsvp
item.name: Sangria Party
